text: Concord Production Inc. (協和電影公司) was a production company founded in 1972 in Hong Kong (british) by Bruce Lee and Raymond Chow. Concord went defunct in 1976. The Golden Harvest was in charge of the distribution. == Movies == The company has produced The Way of the Dragon (1972), The Game of Death (1972) and Bruce Lee, the Man and the Legend (1973) with Golden Harvest, and Enter the Dragon (1973) with Sequoia Pictures and Warner Bros.. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Bruce Lee Category:Companies of Hong Kong Category:Golden Harvest distribution
title: Concord Production Inc.
